data.title: List of Lucille Ball performances
data.text:
Appearances by American actress Lucille Ball (August 6, 1911 – April 26, 1989).

Lucille Ball appeared in movies and on television from 1927 until 1986.

Year Title Role Notes Ref(s) 1927 Tillie the Toiler Extra Claimed by Ball, but disputed 1933 The Bowery Blonde
